
{{Client function}}

{{New feature/item|3.0150|1.5.0|7048|
This function returns the type for a [[/Element/Light.md|light]] element.
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int getLightType ( light theLight )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/light.md|light]]:getType}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theLight:''' The [[/Element/Light.md|light]] that you wish to retrieve the type of.

=== Returns ===
Returns an [[/int.md|int]] containing the type of the specified light, ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.

===Example===
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
local light = createLight(1, 2, 3, 4)
outputChatBox("light type " .. getLightType(light))
</syntaxhighlight>
